content: Hi @Nagesh Bashyam , I am trying to run the eCRNow app and I am seeing an issue with the UI tool not connecting to the eCRNow application. I just did a fresh pull from GIT of both the projects and I am able to build them fine. The eCRNow application runs fine by itself. localhost:3000 for the UI tool takes me to the 'splash screen' message indicating it cannot connect to the eCRNow application.
Re: Flatiron's R3.x.x eCR Now FHIR App integration.
This was resolved, it was running fine as per the release.
